446:       def Iq.gen_roster(session, id)
447:         iq = Iq.new(session, id)
448:         iq.type = "get"
449:         iq.xmlns = "jabber:iq:roster"
450:         return iq
451:         #return XMLElement.new("iq", {"type"=>"get", "id"=>id}).add_child("query", {"xmlns"=>"jabber:iq:roster"}).to_s
452:       end
